solver.distributedMemory.constraints

Class SchedulingConstraints

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.distributedMemory.constraints.SchedulingConstraints

  • public class SchedulingConstraints
extends java.lang.Object
    Scheduling constraints for design flow. We allocate certain actors to certain clusters or processors. We can apply them as constraints to the scheduling solver. TODO : These constraints have to be made generic such a way that they could be applied to different solvers. This way we plan to make a feedback step from the scheduling phase back to partitioning and placement step.
    Author:
    Pranav Tendulkar

      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Cluster> actorsRestrictedToDmaOfCluster
      Actor name as key with DMA of a cluster as value where it should be allocated.
